name: Shuffle-Board VR
description:
Shuffle-Board VR is a relaxed physical game,goof for both the old and the young.Graceful music,beautiful table...we are waiting for your coming.Never worry about there's no enough place to contain a real Shuffle-Board.

Properties:

1.True feeling table:Great Physics engine will give you fun easily.

2.AI Mode:You can play with different level AI player,and get imapct pleasure with him.

3.Entertainment Mode:forget match,it's just a real Shuffle-Board.

4.New player Mode:Don't know how to play,you can try this.
